original_text: Then they will make one long loud noise with their trumpets. As soon as you hear this, all the soldiers must give a loud shout. Then the city walls will fall down. The whole army will go straight into the city.’
korean_text: 제사장들이 양각 나팔을 길게 불어 그 나팔 소리가 너희에게 들릴 때에는 백성은 다 큰 소리로 외쳐 부를 것이라 그리하면 그 성벽이 무너져 내리리니 백성은 각기 앞으로 올라갈지니라 하시매

sentences.original_text: Then they will make one long loud noise
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그들은 길고 큰 소리를 낼 것입니다

sentences.original_text: As soon as you hear this
all the soldiers must give a loud shout
Then the city walls will fall down
The whole army will go straight into the city
sentences.korean_translation: 전체 군대가 곧장 도시로 들어갈 것입니다
